identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix social utility with gallery aesthetics
Emotion First: The interface recedes, content pops
Content is King: Every pixel serves the media
Negative Space: Generous padding > separator lines

colors.instructions: Use white for main backgrounds, off-white for separation if needed. Text should never be pure black (#000000), use #262626. Action blue is #0095F6. Use the gradient for Story rings and main brand moments.

reels.container: h-[calc(100vh-50px)] w-full snap-y snap-mandatory overflow-y-scroll scrollbar-hide

BottomNav.specs: Fixed bottom, 5 icons (Home, Search, Create, Reels, Profile), height 50px, border-t, bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-md z-50
BottomNav.icons: Use lucide-react icons: Home, Search, SquarePlus, Clapperboard, User (or Avatar)

TopNav.specs: Sticky top, logo left, actions right (Heart, Message), height 54px, bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-md z-40 px-4 border-b border-black/5

StoryRail.specs: Horizontal scroll, no scrollbar, p-4, gap-4. Items: Gradient ring p-[2px] rounded-full -> white border p-[2px] -> Avatar.

FeedPost.specs: Header (Avatar + Username + MoreIcon), Media (Full width/aspect 4:5), Actions (Heart, Message, Send - Save right), Likes count, Caption, Comments link.

visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Active states on buttons scale down 0.95. Heart icon pops on click.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors and font families.
2. Clean App.js/App.css: Remove the default React spinning logo. Make App.js the router root.
3. Icons: Install lucide-react (yarn add lucide-react). Use it for all UI icons.
4. Mobile First: Build for mobile width first, then center content max-w-md for desktop view.
5. Mock Data: Create a robust mock data file (data.js) using the provided image URLs.
6. Navigation: Ensure BottomNav is visible on all main screens (Home, Explore, Reels, Profile).
7. Reels: Implement a snap-scroll vertical container. Video can be simulated with tall images if actual video URLs are missing, but structure must be video-ready.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT center align the app container text globally.
Use data-testid for all interactive elements.
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA).
No generic gradients - use the specific Instagram gradient only for branding.
